metadata.title: CVE-2018-16839 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Curl versions 7.33.0 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a buffer overrun inthe SASL authentication code that may lead to denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3 - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
libcurl3-nss - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.35.0-1ubuntu2.19').
